tier_1.name: Blade Disciple
tier_1.description: This mastery is outclassed by Deadly Precision. Should only be taken on champions with guaranteed criticals or requires pure attack (e.g. Bomb Debuff champion). In late game with 100% Critical Rate equipment, this becomes more beneficial for damage dealers.
tier_1.notes: Outclassed by Deadly Precision for most champions

tier_1.name: Deadly Precision
tier_1.description: Commonly used by 99% of champions and benefits significantly for Attack role. Usually paired with Keen Strike to gain a 3% damage boost on average.
tier_1.notes: Core mastery for all damage dealers

tier_2.name: Heart of Glory
tier_2.effect: +5% damage when attacking with full health
tier_2.description: Perfect for Arena. Great for champions with healing abilities or Lifesteal Set. Works well with Shield champions. Can boost Warmaster and Giant Slayer mastery damage.

tier_2.name: Keen Strike
tier_2.description: Best offense mastery as it significantly boosts damage when combo'd with decent Critical Rate.
tier_2.notes: Core mastery for all damage dealers

tier_2.name: Shield Breaker
tier_2.description: Useful against Shield champions in Arena and Magic Keep boss. Extra damage only applies to shield, not HP. Does not benefit champions whose skills ignore shield completely.

tier_2.name: Grim Resolve
tier_2.effect: +5% damage when attacking with 50% HP or less
tier_2.description: Excellent for long battles. Synergizes with Lifesteal Set or Life Drinker mastery. Recommended on champions with self-revive passive or unkillable/block damage buffs when low health. Commonly used in Unkillable Clan Boss.

tier_3.name: Single Out
tier_3.effect: +8% damage to targets with less than 40% HP
tier_3.description: Great against bosses like Clan Boss below 40% HP. Improves damage from skills and Tier 6 masteries (Warmaster/Giant Slayer). Does NOT enhance Poison or HP Burn damage.
tier_3.notes: Boosts Warmaster/Giant Slayer, NOT Poison/HP Burn

tier_3.name: Life Drinker
tier_3.effect: Heals by 5% of damage inflicted when attacking with 50% HP or less
tier_3.description: Synergizes well with Warmaster and Giant Slayer for high damage and healing simultaneously.
tier_3.notes: Synergizes with Grim Resolve (T2), Warmaster/Giant Slayer (T6)

tier_3.name: Whirlwind of Death
tier_3.effect: +6 speed for each enemy killed, stacks across rounds, max +18 speed
tier_3.description: Only for attacker champions who do the killing. Does not apply to Spider's Den Spiderlings. Not recommended for speed-tuned teams unless there's sufficient speed gap. Safe on fastest champion (e.g. Decrease Defense debuffer).
tier_3.notes: AVOID for speed-tuned Clan Boss teams

tier_3.name: Ruthless Ambush
tier_3.effect: +8% damage for the first hit on each enemy
tier_3.description: Useful in Arena and for Attackers who can guarantee a kill in the first hit.

tier_4.name: Bring It Down
tier_4.effect: +6% damage when attacking targets with higher max HP
tier_4.description: Best mastery for bosses or enemies with large HP pools.
tier_4.notes: Always active vs Clan Boss (200M HP)

tier_4.name: Wrath of the Slain
tier_4.effect: +5% damage for each dead ally, up to 10%
tier_4.description: Excellent for farmer champions when leveling fodder. Great for Defense or HP Champions who are usually last standing.

tier_4.name: Cycle of Violence
tier_4.effect: 30% chance to decrease random skill cooldown by 1 turn if damage exceeds 30% of target's max HP (once per turn)
tier_4.description: Usually taken by Attack champions who can burst high damage against weaker targets or pre-weakened enemies.
tier_4.notes: Requires high burst damage (30% MAX HP threshold)

tier_4.name: Opportunist
tier_4.effect: +12% damage to targets with [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification] debuffs
tier_4.description: Useless against Dungeon bosses and Clan Boss (immune to these debuffs). Arena only.
tier_4.notes: AVOID for PVE (bosses immune to crowd control)

tier_5.name: Methodical
tier_5.effect: +2% damage on default skill each use, stacks across rounds, max +10%
tier_5.description: Best for champions not strong enough for final killing blow. Highly recommended for Dungeon Bosses and Clan Boss.
tier_5.notes: Increases A1 damage over time (critical for Clan Boss)

tier_5.name: Kill Streak
tier_5.effect: +6% damage in Arena/Siege (3% elsewhere) for each enemy killed, stacks across rounds, max +12%
tier_5.description: Best for Attack champions with multiple kills via devastating burst damage.

tier_5.name: Blood Shield
tier_5.effect: Places [Shield] buff (15% of MAX HP) for 1 turn when killing an enemy (once per turn)
tier_5.description: Best for Attacker Champions to survive longer. Does not trigger on Spider's Den Spiderlings.
tier_5.notes: Does NOT trigger on Spider spiderlings

tier_5.name: Stoked to Fury
tier_5.effect: +4% damage for each debuff on this champion, max +12%
tier_5.description: Not generally useful. Can synergize with Gurptuk placing Poison on your champions. Popular in Spider's Den for Royal Guard. Conflicts with Heart of Glory unless using Shield Set.
tier_5.notes: Niche mastery, conflicts with Heart of Glory

tier_6.name: Warmaster
tier_6.effect: 60% chance of bonus damage: 10% of target's MAX HP (4% for Bosses), once per skill
tier_6.description: Excellent for Clan Boss and Dungeon bosses. Higher proc chance than Giant Slayer. Does not count as hit on Fire Knight.
tier_6.notes: PRIMARY T6 mastery for 1-2 hit champions (vs Giant Slayer for multi-hit). Procs on any hit regardless of crit (60% chance per skill activation).

damage_formula.boss: 4% of target MAX HP (3% for Clan Boss specifically)
damage_formula.proc_mechanic: 60% chance per skill activation, regardless of hit type (crit or non-crit)

tier_6.name: Helmsmasher
tier_6.effect: 50% chance to ignore 25% of target's DEF (additive with DEF-ignore skills)
tier_6.description: Great against high defense champions in Arena and Dungeons.
tier_6.notes: Situational T6, outclassed by Warmaster/Giant Slayer/Flawless for most content

tier_6.name: Giant Slayer
tier_6.effect: 30% chance of bonus damage: 7.5% of target's MAX HP (3% for Bosses), can occur on each hit
tier_6.description: Excellent for multi-hit champions like Coldheart. Does not count as hit on Fire Knight.
tier_6.notes: PRIMARY T6 mastery for 3+ hit champions (vs Warmaster for 1-2 hit). Procs on any hit regardless of crit (30% chance per hit).

damage_formula.multi_hit: Can proc on EACH hit (major advantage over Warmaster), regardless of hit type (crit or non-crit)
damage_formula.proc_mechanic: 30% chance per individual hit in multi-hit skills

tier_6.name: Flawless Execution
tier_6.description: Take on anyone not getting Giant Slayer or Warmaster. Best for burst damage in Arena.
tier_6.notes: DEFAULT T6 if not using Warmaster/Giant Slayer

tier_1.name: Defiant
tier_1.description: Recommended for high resist builds or to unlock nearby Defense Masteries like Improved Parry.

tier_2.name: Blastproof
tier_2.description: Staple defensive mastery for PvE (most bosses use AoE). Pick over Improved Parry if enemy doesn't frequently crit.
tier_2.notes: CORE defensive mastery (bosses use frequent AOE)

tier_2.name: Rejuvenation
tier_2.description: Enhances Lifesteal Set effectiveness. Increases Continuous Heal buff and artifact sets (Immortal, Regeneration, Guardian).

tier_2.name: Mighty Endurance
tier_2.effect: -10% damage received if champion has [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification] debuffs
tier_2.description: Useful for champions who self-inflict crowd control (e.g. Skytouched Shaman, Tormin the Cold).

tier_2.name: Improved Parry
tier_2.effect: -8% damage received when hit with a critical hit
tier_2.description: Recommended for Arena (enemies have high Crit Rate). Pick over Blastproof for surviving boss crits, especially for solo dungeon champions.

tier_3.name: Shadow Heal
tier_3.effect: Heals 6% of MAX HP each time an enemy is healed (once per turn)
tier_3.description: Common for HP and Defense champions to heal quickly when opponent heals (skills, Lifesteal, Continuous Heal). Excellent for Arena.

tier_3.name: Resurgent
tier_3.effect: 50% chance to remove 1 random debuff when losing 25% of MAX HP or more from a single enemy skill
tier_3.description: Provides debuff cleanse on heavy hits.

tier_3.name: Bloodthirst
tier_3.effect: Heals 10% of max HP when killing an enemy target (1 turn cooldown)
tier_3.description: Does not trigger on Spider's Den Spiderlings.
tier_3.notes: Does NOT trigger on Spider spiderlings

tier_3.name: Wisdom of Battle
tier_3.effect: 30% chance to place [Block Debuffs] buff for 1 turn when [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification] debuffs expire
tier_3.description: Provides protection after crowd control expires.

tier_4.name: Solidarity
tier_4.effect: +5 Ally Resist for each buff placed on them by this Champion
tier_4.description: Increases team resistance through buff placement.

tier_4.name: Delay Death
tier_4.effect: -0.75% damage from specific enemy per hit, stacks up to -6% per enemy
tier_4.description: Gradually reduces damage from each enemy over multiple hits.

tier_4.name: Harvest Despair
tier_4.effect: 60% chance to place [Leech] debuff for 1 turn when placing [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification] debuffs
tier_4.description: Adds sustain through leech when landing crowd control.

tier_4.name: Stubbornness
tier_4.effect: +10 RESIST for each debuff on this champion, max +30

tier_5.name: Selfless Defender
tier_5.effect: -20% damage to ally from first enemy hit in each round; this Champion receives that damage instead
tier_5.description: Redirects first hit damage to protect allies.

tier_5.name: Cycle of Revenge
tier_5.effect: 50% chance to increase Turn Meter by 15% when ally is attacked with a critical hit (once per skill)
tier_5.description: Provides turn meter boost when allies are critically hit.

tier_5.name: Retribution
tier_5.effect: 50% chance to counterattack when losing 25% of MAX HP or more from a single enemy skill

tier_5.name: Deterrence
tier_5.effect: 20% chance to counterattack when enemy applies [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification] debuff on an ally (1 turn cooldown)
tier_5.description: Counterattacks when allies are crowd controlled.

tier_6.name: Iron Skin
tier_6.description: Used for super tanky Clan Boss builds, but better masteries available for damage/synergy.
tier_6.notes: Outclassed by other T6 masteries for most builds

tier_6.name: Bulwark
tier_6.effect: -5% damage to all allies; this Champion receives that damage instead

tier_6.name: Fearsome Presence
tier_6.effect: +5% chance to place [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification] debuff from Skills or Artifacts

tier_6.name: Unshakeable
tier_6.description: Recommended for Buffer support champions (revivers, healers, cleansers) to avoid disruption and maintain defensive capabilities.

tier_1.name: Steadfast
tier_1.description: Recommended for Support Champions who heal/shield based on HP. Good for champions without debuff skills who support through healing, cleansing, or reviving.

tier_1.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
tier_1.description: Highly recommended for champions who inflict debuffs. More Accuracy = lower resist chance.
tier_1.notes: CORE mastery for all debuff champions

tier_2.name: Lay on Hands
tier_2.effect: +5% value of heals cast by this Champion
tier_2.description: Excellent for Healing champions. Increases Continuous Heal buff and artifact sets (Immortal, Regeneration, Guardian).

tier_2.name: Shieldbearer
tier_2.effect: +5% value of [Shield] buffs cast by this Champion
tier_2.description: Excellent for Shield champions. Effect is multiplicative (5% of base value, e.g., 20% becomes 21%).

tier_2.name: Exalt in Death
tier_2.effect: Heals 10% of Max HP the first time an enemy is killed in each round
tier_2.description: Great for Campaign solo farming. Does not require champion to land killing blow. Not useful in single-round battles (Spider's Den, Arena).

tier_2.name: Charged Focus
tier_2.effect: +20 ACC when this Champion has no skills on Cooldown
tier_2.description: Worth taking for debuff champions. Better for champions with only 1 cooldown skill (e.g. Outlaw Monk).

tier_3.name: Healing Savior
tier_3.effect: +10% healing and [Shield] buff value if target ally has 40% HP or less
tier_3.description: Excellent for Healing and Shield champions. Increases Continuous Heal buff and artifact sets (Immortal, Regeneration, Guardian).

tier_3.name: Rapid Response
tier_3.effect: 30% chance to increase Turn Meter by 10% when a buff cast by this Champion is removed or expires
tier_3.description: Don't take for Counterattack Clan Boss teams (can mess up speed tune).
tier_3.notes: AVOID for speed-tuned Clan Boss teams

tier_3.name: Swarm Smiter
tier_3.effect: +4 ACC for each enemy alive, max +16
tier_3.description: Great for Arena, decent elsewhere. Even Clan Boss gets +4 ACC. Good if you have debuffs.

tier_3.name: Arcane Celerity
tier_3.effect: 30% chance to increase Turn Meter by 10% when a debuff cast by this Champion is removed or expires
tier_3.description: Does not trigger if enemy defeated before debuff expires/removed. Does not work on permanent debuffs (Block Revive). Don't take for Counterattack Clan Boss. Not recommended for 100% uptime non-stackable debuffs. Only Poison is stackable.
tier_3.notes: AVOID for speed-tuned Clan Boss, AVOID for 100% uptime debuffs (Decrease DEF/ATK)

tier_4.name: Merciful Aid
tier_4.effect: +15% healing and [Shield] buff value if target ally has [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification] debuffs
tier_4.description: Increases Continuous Heal buff and artifact sets (Immortal, Regeneration, Guardian).

tier_4.name: Cycle of Magic
tier_4.effect: 5% chance to decrease random skill cooldown by 1 turn at start of every turn
tier_4.notes: Low proc rate, random target, generally not recommended

tier_4.name: Lore of Steel
tier_4.effect: +15% to Set Bonuses of Basic Artifact Sets
tier_4.description: Multiplicative increase. Only applies to stat boosts (e.g., 12% Speed becomes 13.8%). Does NOT boost special set proc rates (Freeze, Stun, Retaliation, etc.).
tier_4.notes: DOES NOT boost set proc rates (Freeze, Stun, etc.)

tier_4.name: Evil Eye
tier_4.effect: First hit with default skill: -20% Turn Meter (single-target) or -5% (AoE)
tier_4.description: Works even if special abilities used first. Must-have for Arena. Doesn't work on some bosses (Clan Boss). Requires accuracy.
tier_4.notes: MUST-HAVE for Arena, AVOID for Clan Boss

tier_5.name: Lasting Gifts
tier_5.effect: 30% chance to extend buff duration by 1 turn
tier_5.description: Will NOT extend [Block Damage], [Unkillable], or [Revive on Death]. Does not extend artifact buffs (Shield Set, Immunity Set, Bloodshield accessories).
tier_5.notes: CRITICAL for buff extension teams (e.g. Godseeker Aniri A2 + Lasting Gifts = +2 turn extension)

tier_5.name: Spirit Haste
tier_5.effect: +8 SPD for each dead ally, max +24
tier_5.description: Specialized for farmers, tankers, or champions who revive allies.

tier_5.name: Sniper
tier_5.effect: +5% chance to place any debuff from Skills or Artifacts
tier_5.description: Will NOT increase [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification] chances. Useful for Toxic/Cursed Set. Works with skills showing 'Buff/Debuff Chance +x%' on skill upgrades. Works with Increase Debuff Duration, Remove Buff, Steal Buff per Plarium forum.
tier_5.notes: Does NOT increase crowd control chances

tier_5.name: Master Hexer
tier_5.effect: 30% chance to extend debuff duration by 1 turn
tier_5.description: Will NOT extend [Stun], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], or [Petrification]. Suitable for DoTs (Poison, HP Burn) or performance debuffs (Decrease Attack/Defense/Speed, Weaken). Does NOT extend Debuff Extensions. DOES extend non-crowd-control artifact debuffs (Toxic, Cursed Sets).
tier_5.notes: CRITICAL for HP Burn/Poison uptime (e.g. Geomancer HP Burn 3-turn → 4-turn)

tier_6.name: Elixir of Life
tier_6.description: Recommended for Support Champions in Arena (Gold~Platinum) or Faction Wars who heal/shield based on HP.

tier_6.name: Timely Intervention
tier_6.effect: +20% Turn Meter whenever an ally drops below 25% HP
tier_6.description: Recommended for Support in Arena/Faction Wars. Enables quick turn for healing or reviving critical/dead allies.

tier_6.name: Oppressor
tier_6.effect: +2.5% Turn Meter fill rate for each active debuff cast by the Champion, max +10%
tier_6.description: Basically 10% speed buff at max (like Increase Speed buff). Recommended for multi-Poison or HP Burn champions. Champion should have high Speed (200+) to benefit most.
tier_6.notes: Requires 4 active debuffs for max benefit (10% speed buff)

tier_6.name: Eagle Eye
tier_6.description: Recommended for Support in Arena/Faction Wars. Boosts Accuracy to inflict debuffs on high-resist enemies for crowd control or setup for killing blow.
tier_6.notes: CORE T6 for debuff support champions

metadata.notes: Structured JSON conversion of all RAID Shadow Legends masteries for automation and cross-referencing
